definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: The soldiers of Baker Company , 31st Infantry, would be in reserve.
sentences.chinese: 陆军31步兵团的B连被留作为预备队。

sentences.english: Within a short while the 13th Army Group was completely wiped out, with all its troops surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 第十三兵团随即全军覆没，所属部队全部投降。

sentences.english: Waldo is with the 27th Infantry Regiment.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔多是第27步兵团的士兵。

sentences.english: It's vital goal for Xinjiang Produnction & Construction Corps to safeguard the security of northwestern borders.
sentences.chinese: 保障国家西北边疆安全是新疆兵团的重要目标。

sentences.english: The letter was signed by Xiang Wenying from the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.
sentences.chinese: 这封的署名为新疆建设兵团的向问英。

sentences.english: Then the Army Corps of Engineer demanded a map of the proposed new flood plain.
sentences.chinese: 然后，工程师兵团要求的建议的新的冲积平原的地图。

sentences.english: You ever served in an infantry unit, son?
sentences.chinese: 你曾在步兵团服过役吗，小子？

sentences.english: I served in a parachute regiment. During a nighttime exercise, I was seated next to a young officer.
There's a building guarded by the local militia at the corner of the street.
sentences.chinese: 街道拐角处有一幢由当地民兵团守卫的大楼。

sentences.english: By the end of 1966, all the XPCC's undertakings had developed to a rather high level.
sentences.chinese: 到1966年底，兵团的各项事业发展到较高的水平。

sentences.english: Here in the regiment everything was clear and simple.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，在兵团里，一切都是简而明的。

sentences.english: The technology of mechanical harvesting which has been implemented is an important measure in solving the problem.
sentences.chinese: 兵团大力推广机采棉技术，是解决该问题的重要手段。

sentences.english: Xinjiang Production & Construction Corps is also the key component of Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 新疆生产建设兵团也是新疆的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The corps' workers are direct cartier of safeguarding the borders.
sentences.chinese: 兵团职工是屯垦戍边的直接载体。

sentences.english: As a member of the mercenary group, the main character falls into a trap.
sentences.chinese: 身为佣兵团一员的主角，在进入迷宫后却中了陷阱。

sentences.english: Well-drilled, well-equipped heavy infantry form the backbone of the army.
sentences.chinese: 有良好的装备和演习的步兵团是这个军队的支柱。

definition: expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
geographical area of command/(PLA) military district
wing (of an air force)/sports team representing a combination of entities (e.g. United Korea)
